summary: The diff implements upgraded cafe furniture geometry/materials, improves the Menu prop into a clearer 3D coffee cup with a "Menu" label while preserving click/hover/press feedback, and adds multiple new non-interactive scene-dressing props (>=5) in plausible cafe locations. However, the diff summary also indicates several unrelated interaction/UI changes (onboarding behavior, help button, additional interaction systems) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Onboarding overlay behavior changed so it no longer opens automatically on first visit; added ability to manually trigger via a help button.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on 3D cafe realism/furniture/props and explicitly lists non-goals around adding new UI concepts; onboarding/help behavior changes were not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (App.tsx summary mentions onboarding no longer opens automatically; HelpButton can manually trigger)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded interaction systems such as POI markers with gaze-based dwell detection, proximity zones with contextual prompts, an auto-opening door controller, and an inspectable draggable prop.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for upgraded furniture and added scene dressing props, and does not request new interaction mechanics beyond maintaining the existing Menu cup click behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (InteractionManager.tsx, POIMarkers.tsx, ProximityZones.tsx, DoorController.tsx, InspectableProp.tsx summaries)

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced React Query hooks for contact message operations with runtime normalization, deployment diagnostics, and detailed backend failure logging.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not related to upgrading 3D furniture/props; BuildRequest also suggests backend changes are unnecessary for this request.
